data.trans: Đã quen với, làm quen với
data.trans_hint: Ông Derek đã quen với những nhà hàng sang trọng và lịch sự này.
data.en_hint: Mr. Derek is accustomed to these very formal and luxurious restaurants.
data.content_game_1: Mr. Derek is accustomed to these very formal and luxurious restaurants.
data.answer_en_hint: Mr. Derek is accustomed to these very formal and luxurious restaurants.

data.trans_hint: Khi chúng tôi đến chỗ nhà hàng mới mở, đã có một hàng dài đang đợi.
data.en_hint: By the time we arrived at the new restaurant, there had been a long line waiting.
data.content_game_1: By the time we arrived at the new restaurant, there had been a long line waiting.
data.answer_en_hint: By the time we arrived at the new restaurant, there had been a long line waiting.

data.trans_hint: Tôi bị ấn tượng bởi họ giao bữa trưa của chúng tôi rất nhanh chóng.
data.en_hint: I was impressed with how quickly they delivered our lunch.
data.content_game_1: I was impressed with how quickly they delivered our lunch.
data.answer_en_hint: I was impressed with how quickly they delivered our lunch.

data.trans: Chịu trách nhiệm về việc gì
data.trans_hint: Tôi chịu trách nhiệm chuẩn bị gần như toàn bộ các món ăn trong thực đơn.
data.en_hint: I am responsible for preparing nearly all menu items.
data.content_game_1: I am responsible for preparing nearly all menu items.
data.answer_en_hint: I am responsible for preparing nearly all menu items.

data.trans_hint: Các chuỗi khách sạn giá bình dân đã tạo ra một tác động rất lớn đến ngành công nghiệp.
data.en_hint: Budget-priced hotel chains have made a huge impact on the industry.
data.content_game_1: Budget-priced hotel chains have made a huge impact on the industry.
data.answer_en_hint: Budget-priced hotel chains have made a huge impact on the industry.

data.trans: Một cách táo bạo, mạnh dạn
data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi mạnh dạn gọi món mực sống.
data.en_hint: We daringly ordered the raw squid.
data.content_game_1: We daringly ordered the raw squid.
data.answer_en_hint: We daringly ordered the raw squid.

data.trans_hint: Món ăn có mùi vị quen thuộc đến lạ, như thể bà tôi đã nấu nó.
data.en_hint: The dish tastes strangely familiar, as if my grandmother had cooked it.
data.content_game_1: The dish tastes strangely familiar, as if my grandmother had cooked it.
data.answer_en_hint: The dish tastes strangely familiar, as if my grandmother had cooked it.

data.trans: Tuyệt vời, cực kỳ to lớn, kỳ lạ
data.trans_hint: The Waterfall Room là một nhà hàng tuyệt vời vừa được mở trên Đại lộ Maple.
data.en_hint: The Waterfall Room is a fantastic restaurant that has just opened on Maple Avenue.
data.content_game_1: The Waterfall Room is a fantastic restaurant that has just opened on Maple Avenue.
data.answer_en_hint: The Waterfall Room is a fantastic restaurant that has just opened on Maple Avenue.

data.trans_hint: Người giám sát đi lại xung quanh để giám sát công việc của họ.
data.en_hint: The supervisor walked around inspecting their work.
data.content_game_1: The supervisor walked around inspecting their work.
data.answer_en_hint: The supervisor walked around inspecting their work.

data.trans_hint: Phần lớn thành viên trong nhóm muốn thử nhà hàng Trung Quốc mới.
data.en_hint: The majority of the group wanted to try the new Chinese restaurant.
data.content_game_1: The majority of the group wanted to try the new Chinese restaurant.
data.answer_en_hint: The majority of the group wanted to try the new Chinese restaurant.

data.trans_hint: Nhà hàng này chỉ giao bánh pizza và xăng uých, điều đó hẳn nhiên đã thu hẹp các lựa chọn.
data.en_hint: This restaurant delivers only pizza and sandwiches, so that certainly narrows down the choices.
data.content_game_1: This restaurant delivers only pizza and sandwiches, so that certainly narrows down the choices.
